steps.dialogue: Look at this comparison. Why is it true?

options.text: Both fractions show eighths. 5 > 2, so 5/8 is greater.
The bigger the denominator, the bigger the fraction.
The bottom number tells us which fraction is greater.
The fraction with more total pieces is greater.

correct_answer.context: When fractions have the same denominator, compare numerators - 5 pieces is more than 2 pieces of the same size

steps.success_path_dialogue: That's right. That explanation is correct.
